text: Reaction: After an opponent collects income, kneel White Tree to move 1 gold from that player's gold pool to your own.

name: White Raven
text: Forced Reaction: After you lose a [power] challenge, sacrifice White Raven. Reaction: After you win dominance, if there is a Summer or Winter plot card revealed, gain 1 power for your faction.

name: Ruby of R'hllor
text: R'hllor character only. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge in which attached character is attacking, name a card. The losing opponent reveals his or her hand and discards each card with that name.

flavor: "And this so-called Lord of Harrenhal is a butcher's whelp upjumped by the Lannisters. Small wonder he is venal and corrupt." <cite>Ser Denys Mallister</cite>
name: Janos Slynt
text: Intimidate. Action: Pay 1 gold to give Janos Slynt +2 STR until the end of the phase.

name: Levies at the Rock
text: Reaction: After a player initiates a challenge against you, move up to X gold from that player's gold pool to your own. X is the number of attacking characters.

flavor: Her father had forbidden her to come ashore, but whenever Theon came to Lordsport he spied her wandering forlornly about the deck.
name: Captain's Daughter
text: Reaction: After a non-loyal character enters play, kneel your faction card and sacrifice Captain's Daughter to put that character onto the top of it's owner's deck.

flavor: The point of land on which the Greyjoys had raised their fortress had once thrust like a sword into the bowels of the ocean, but the waves had hammered at it day and night until the land broke and shattered, thousands of years past.
name: Pyke
text: Action: Kneel Pyke to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth.

name: Viserys Targaryen
text: While Viserys Targaryen is attacking, each King character must be declared as a defender, if able. Interrupt: When the dominance phase ends, if no opponent controls a King character, Viserys Targaryen gains 1 power.

flavor: The dothraki named the comet shierak qiya, the Bleeding Star.
name: Shierak Qiya
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to choose and stand a participating character.

name: Harmen Uller
text: Renown. Each Sand Snake character in your hand gains ambush (X). X is 1 less than that card's printed cost.

flavor: ...the last light of the afternoon was slanting down through thick windows of many-colored glass to dapple the pale marble with diamonds of half a hundred colors.
name: Tower of the Sun
text: Reaction: After an event is played, gain 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.)

flavor: The pyromancers said that only three things burned hotter than their substance: dragonflame, the fires beneath the earth, and the summer sun.
name: Pyromancers
text: Dominance Action: Kneel Pyromancers and discard 1 power from your faction card to choose a non-limited location, and discard it from play.

name: Rains of Autumn
text: Characters and locations do not provide positive gold modifiers.

flavor: "In a room sit three great men, a king, a priest, and a rich man with his gold. Between them stands a sellsword, a little man of common birth and no great mind. Each of the great ones bids him slay the other two." <cite>Varys</cite>
name: Varys's Riddle
text: When Revealed: Initiate the when revealed ability on a revealed non-Riddle plot card as if you had just revealed it.

flavor: Poor wan Lady Hornwood sat beside him, her face a stony mask as she picked listlessly at her food.
name: Donella Hornwood
text: Reduce the cost of the first loyal card you marshal or play each round by 1.

flavor: Strong as a bear. Fierce as a wolverine. Fear cuts deeper than swords.
name: Fear Cuts Deeper Than Swords
text: Interrupt: When the effects of an ability that chooses a [stark] character you control as its only target would initiate, cancel those effects and stand that character.

flavor: "...they are the knights of summer, and winter is coming." <cite>Catelyn Stark</cite>
name: Knight of Summer
text: While there are more Summer plot cards than Winter plot cards revealed, Knight of Summer gets +2 STR and gains renown.

name: There Is My Claim
text: Play only during a challenge. Challenges Action: Reveal 4 [tyrell] characters from your hand to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Max 1 per challenge.)

flavor: "I never wanted to see half the things I've seen, and I've never seen half the things I wanted to. I don't think wanting comes into it."
name: Dolorous Edd
text: Action: During an [intrigue] challenge in which you are the defending player, kneel your faction card to put Dolorous Edd into play from your hand knelt, participating as a defender. If you win the challenge, you may return him to your hand.

flavor: "A craven can be as brave as any man, when there is nothing to fear." <cite>Maester Aemon</cite>
name: Craven
text:
Terminal.
Attached character cannot be declared as an attacker.

flavor: Pylos seemed clever and diligent and well-meaning, but he was so young, and the king did not confide in him as he had in Cressen.
name: Maester Pylos
text: Stealth.

flavor: Dragonstone's central keep, so named for the way its ancient walls boomed and rumbled during storms.
name: The Stone Drum
text: While there is a Kingdom plot card revealed, increase the gold value on your revealed plot card by 1.

flavor: "Did you miss me?"
name: Shae
text: Challenges Action: Pay 1 gold to stand Shae. (Limit twice per phase.)

name: The Boy King
text: Lord character only. Attached character gains the King trait. Reaction: After a character with printed cost 3 or lower is killed, kneel The Boy King to have attached character gain 1 power.

name: Balon Greyjoy
text: Renown. Balon Greyjoy does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge against an opponent who does not control a King character. Action: Kneel a [greyjoy] location to give each loyal character you control +1 STR until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)

name: Ours is the Old Way
text: Challenges Action: Until the end of the phase, either: each [greyjoy] character you control gains stealth, or each non-[greyjoy] character loses stealth.

flavor: "Once there were two moons in the sky, but one wandered too close to the sun and cracked from the heat. A thousand thousand dragons poured forth, and drunk the fire of the sun. That is why dragons breathe flame."
name: Doreah
text: During a challenge in which you control a participating Lord or Lady character, Doreah gains insight.

name: Beggar King
text: [targaryen] character only. Attached character gains the King trait. Reaction: After an opponent reveals a plot card with a higher printed gold value than yours, kneel Beggar King to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if no opponent controls a King character.)

name: Starfall Cavalry
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After Starfall Cavalry enters play, draw 1 card. (3 cards instead if there are 3 or more plot cards in your used pile.)

name: Venomous Blade
text: [martell] character you control only. Ambush (3). Attached character gets +1 STR. Reaction: After Venomous Blade enters play, place a poison token on a character with printed STR 2 or lower. At the end of the phase, if that character still has that poison token, remove it and kill that character.

name: Kings of Summer
text: You cannot include Winter plot cards in your plot deck. Increase the reserve value on each player's revealed plot card by 1. While there are no Winter plot cards revealed, increase the gold value on your revealed Summer plot card by 1.

name: Kings of Winter
text: You cannot include Summer plot cards in your plot deck. Reduce the reserve value on each player's revealed plot card by 1. While you have a Winter plot card revealed, reduce the gold value on each opponent's non-Summer plot card by 1.

name: Summer Harvest
text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. X is 2 higher than the printed gold value on that player's revealed plot card.

name: Winter Festival
text: Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if there are no Summer plot cards revealed, gain 2 power for your faction.

flavor: "Tell Father I have gone to make him proud."
name: Ser Edmure Tully
text: Reaction: After a character gains power, move 1 power from that character to a House Tully character. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "Bear Island is beautiful, but remote." <cite>Ser Jorah Mormont</cite>
name: Bear Island
text: Reaction: After you marshal a loyal card, gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per phase.)

flavor: "He was the king that should have been. He was the best of them." <cite>The Knight of Flowers</cite>
name: Renly Baratheon
text: Insight. Renown. While an opponent controls a King character, Renly Baratheon cannot be saved. Reaction: After you draw a loyal card using insight, reveal it to draw 1 card.

name: Crown of Golden Roses
text: Lord character only. Attached character gains the King trait. Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to give attached character +X STR until the end of the phase. X is the number of challenge icons attached character has. (Limit twice per round.)

flavor: "The Lord Commander's place is at Castle Black, lording and commanding."
name: Thoren Smallwood
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you win a challenge as the defending player, gain 1 power for your faction.

flavor: ...and now my watch begins...
name: Night Gathers...
text: Marshaling Action: Choose an opponent whose reserve value is lower than yours. Until the end of the phase, you may marshal characters from that player's discard pile as if they were in your hand.

flavor: "The Lady Melisandre tells us that sometimes R'hllor permits his faithful servants to glimpse the future in flames." <cite>Ser Axell Florent</cite>
name: Asshai Priestess
text: Reaction: After you marshal Asshai Priestess, choose and kneel a character with STR 2 or lower.

flavor: "The shadows come to dance, my lord, dance my lord, dance my lord..." <cite>Patchface</cite>
name: Visited by Shadows
text:
Opponent's character only.
Attached character gets -1 STR.

flavor: Through the open visor of his helm, a face pale and piggy peered up.
name: Ser Amory Lorch
text: While an opponent controls 3 or fewer characters, Ser Amory Lorch gains renown.

name: Harrenhal
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Harrenhal to put a [lannister] or House Bolton character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, kill it (cannot be saved).

flavor: Beneath the dubious protection of the fish-ridden little castle lay the village of Lordsport, its harbor aswarm with ships.
name: Lordsport Fisherman
text: Reaction: After you marshal Lordsport Fisherman, add the bottom card of your deck to your hand.

name: King of Salt and Rock
text: Ironborn character only. Attached character gains the King trait and pillage. Reaction: After an attachment or location is discarded using pillage, attached character gains 1 power.

flavor: ...a bloodrider was more than a guard. They were the khal's brothers, his shadows, his fiercest friends.
name: Devoted Bloodrider
text: Each Bloodrider character you control gets +1 STR.

flavor: "Jhogo was the first to lay his arakh at her feet."
name: Blood of My Blood
text: Challenges Action: Search your deck for a Bloodrider character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand.

name: Spearmaiden
text: Reaction: After Spearmaiden is declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge, choose a character controlled by the defending player. If you win the challenge by 5 or more STR, that character must be chosen for claim during this challenge, if able.

name: The Scorpion's Sting
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, choose up to X [martell] characters. Each of those characters gains renown until the end of the phase. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile.

flavor: By midday Hot Pie had begun to complain.
name: Hot Pie
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel a Companion character to reduce the cost of the next unique character you marshal this phase by 1.

name: The God's Eye
text:
The God's Eye cannot be discarded from play.
+1 Income
+1 Reserve.

flavor: "I've lost half my men. Horse as well. I'm not taking more into that fire." <cite>The Hound</cite>
name: Dissension
text: Marshaling Action: Choose an Ally character, and discard it from play.

name: Battle of Oxcross
text: Each character with printed cost 4 or higher cannot be declared as a defender during the first challenge you initiate this round.

flavor: "With two eyes you see my face. With three you could see my heart."
name: Jojen Reed
text: Stealth. Reaction: After Jojen Reed stands, reveal the top card of each player's deck. You may either: discard each of those cards, or have each player draw 1 card.

flavor: What should he fear? He was the Young Wolf, King of the Trident and the North.
name: The Wolf King
text: [stark] character only. Attached character gains the King trait and does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge.

name: King Renly's Host
text: Intimidate. No attachments. While there is a Summer plot card revealed, King Renly's Host gets +4 STR. While there is a Winter plot card revealed, King Renly's Host cannot be declared as an attacker.

flavor: Lord Caswell's keep was scarcely tall enough to call a tower, but the country was low and flat and Catelyn could see for leagues in all directions.
name: Caswell's Keep
text: Reaction: After you reveal a plot card, choose a player. Look at the top 2 cards of that player's deck. Place 1 of those cards on the bottom of that deck, and the other on top.

name: Shadow Tower Mason
text: No attachments except Weapon. While you control 3 or more [thenightswatch] locations and/or attachments, Shadow Tower Mason gains a [military] and an [intrigue] icon.

name: The Haunted Forest
text: While The Haunted Forest is standing, it contributes 1 STR to your side during any challenge in which you are the defending player. Forced Reaction: After you lose a challenge, kneel The Haunted Forest.

flavor: "Kings have no friends."
name: Stannis Baratheon
text: During [power] challenges, each participating non-King character gets -1 STR. Reaction: After you win dominance, choose a non-loyal character. That character cannot stand during the standing phase this round.

flavor: "Azor Ahai has come again! All hail the Warrior of Light! All hail the Son of Fire!" <cite>Melisandre</cite>
name: Red God's Blessing
text: Attached character gains the R'hllor trait and gets +1 STR for each R'hllor character you control.

flavor: Since the hour he had arrived in the Red Keep, Lady Tanda had been stalking him, armed with a never-ending arsenal of lamprey pies, wild boars, and savory cream stews.
name: Tanda Stokeworth
text: Reaction: After you marshal Tanda Stokeworth, each player gains 3 gold.

flavor: Shaving him was the cruelest thing Tyrion could have done...
name: Without His Beard
text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, discard up to 3 cards at random from the losing opponent's hand. Then, that player draws 2 cards.

flavor: "Listen! Listen to the waves! Listen to the god!"
name: Aeron Damphair
text: Reaction: After a character is saved, either: stand it, or kneel it.

flavor: The solar was as damp and drafty as ever.
name: King Balon's Solar
text: Reaction: After you win initiative, gain 1 gold.

flavor: "Come with me to the House of the Undying, and you shall drink of truth and wisdom."
name: Pyat Pree
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Pyat Pree is participating, search the top X cards of your deck for a [targaryen] attachment or event, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. X is the STR by which you won the challenge.

flavor: ...in the place they named Vaes Tolorro, the city of bones.
name: Vaes Tolorro
text: Interrupt: When a character with 1 or more power is killed, kneel Vaes Tolorro to move 1 power from that character to Vaes Tolorro. (Up to 2 power instead if that character's STR is 0.)

name: Elia Sand
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth. (Limit twice per phase.)

name: Burning on the Sand
text: Reaction: After you lose an unopposed challenge, set the claim value on the winning opponent's revealed plot card to 0 until the end of the challenge.

name: Jaqen H'ghar
text: Reaction: After Jaqen H'ghar enters play, place a Valar Morghulis token on up to 3 different unique characters. If Jaqen H'ghar leaves play, discard those tokens from play. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Jaqen H'ghar is attacking alone, choose and kill a character with a Valar Morghulis token.

name: Isle of Ravens
text: Action: Kneel Isle of Ravens to choose a card in any player's discard pile, and shuffle it into its owner's deck.

name: King Beyond the Wall
text: Wildling character only. Attached character gains the King trait. While attached character is attacking a player with a higher power total than you, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

name: Valar Morghulis
text: When Revealed: Kill each character.

flavor: "Fear is what keeps a man alive in this world of treachery and deceit."
name: Roose Bolton
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Roose Bolton is attacking, choose up to X total STR worth of characters controlled by the losing opponent. X is Roose Bolton's STR. Sacrifice Roose Bolton to kill each of those characters.

flavor: Harrenhal had seen more horror in its three hundred years than Casterly Rock had witnessed in three thousand.
name: Harrenhal
text: Reaction: After a character enters play, kneel your faction card and sacrifice Harrenhal to kill it.

flavor: "He said that all his other knights wanted things of him, castles or honors or riches, but all that Brienne wanted was to die for him." <cite>The Knight of Flowers</cite>
name: Brienne of Tarth
text: Renown. While you control a King character or Catelyn Stark, Brienne of Tarth does not kneel when declared as a defender.

flavor: "Only Renly could vex me so with a piece of fruit." <cite>Stannis Baratheon</cite>
name: Offer of a Peach
text: Play only if you control Renly Baratheon or a Lady character. Challenges Action: Choose an attacking character. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge.

flavor: "Even so, he's never turned a ranger away from his fire" <cite>Thoren Smallwood</cite>
name: Craster
text: Immune to Omen card effects. Action: Sacrifice Craster to put each character that was killed this phase into play from its owner's dead pile.

flavor: Dragonglass. What the maesters call obsidian.
name: Dragonglass Dagger
text:
[thenightswatch] character only.
While attached character is participating in a challenge, it gets +2 STR and is immune to opponent's character abilities.

flavor: "Aye, I've broken laws, but I never felt evil until tonight."
name: Ser Davos Seaworth
text: Stealth. Reaction: After Ser Davos Seaworth bypasses a non-loyal character using stealth, either: draw 1 card, or gain 1 gold.

flavor: The morning air was dark with the smoke of burning gods.
name: Ritual of R'hllor
text: Reaction: After you win dominance, choose X standing R'hllor characters. Each of those characters gains 1 power.

flavor: "...you can lead a king to water, but with Joff one had to splash it about before he realized he could drink it." <cite>Littlefinger</cite>
name: Joffrey Baratheon
text: Reaction: After you marshal a loyal character, kneel that character and your faction card to choose and kill a non-King character with a lower printed cost.

flavor: In Chataya's brothel, Shae would have all the silks and gems she could wish for, and the gentlest highborn patrons.
name: Chataya's Brothel
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel a character with an [intrigue] icon to gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per phase.)

flavor: "M'lord, I am sent to show you to chambers."
name: Helya
text: Each attachment gains terminal.

flavor: The first three men had offered their lives to the Drowned God fearlessly...
name: Bless Him With Salt
text: Play only during a [power] challenge. Action: Choose a participating Drowned God or Ironborn character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +3 STR. If you win the challenge, draw 1 card.

flavor: ...Xaro Xhoan Daxos saw to it that the great and the humble alike offered some token to the Mother of Dragons.
name: Xaro Xhoan Daxos
text: Reaction: After you marshal a unique attachment, gain 2 gold. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Mother of Dragons
text: Stormborn character you control only. Challenges Action: During a challenge in which you control a participating Dragon character, kneel Mother of Dragons to have attached character participate in the challenge on your side.

flavor: The girl never wept. Young as she was, Myrcella Baratheon was a princess born.
name: Myrcella Baratheon
text: While there are no King characters in play, Myrcella Baratheon gains renown and does not kneel when declared as a defender in a [power] challenge.

name: The Prince's Pass
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, kneel The Prince's Pass to choose an attacking character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice. Then, if it has no challenge icons, you may sacrifice The Prince's Pass to discard it from play.

flavor: The silent sisters prepared men for the grave, and it was ill fortune to look on the face of death.
name: Silent Sisters
text: Silent Sisters gets +1 STR for each character in your dead pile.

flavor: The Frostfangs have a cruel bite, even in summer...
name: The Frostfangs
text: Reaction: After The Frostfangs enters play, give control of it to an opponent. -1 Reserve

name: Quiet as a Shadow
text: Action: Choose a unique character with printed cost 3 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth.

name: Ghosts of Harrenhal
text: When Revealed: Put the top character in each player's dead pile into play.

flavor: Outriders spied the Manderly banners — the white merman with trident in hand, rising from a blue-green sea — and hailed them warmly.
name: House Manderly Knight
text: While there is a Winter plot card revealed, House Manderly Knight gets +2 STR.

flavor: And the stars in the night were the eyes of his wolf, and the wind itself was their song.
name: "Wolf in the Night"
text: Action: Choose a [stark] character that is attacking alone. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +3 STR and gains renown.

name: Ser Robar Royce
text: Reaction: After a Summer plot card is revealed, Ser Robar Royce gains 1 power. (Limit once per phase). Forced Reaction: After a Winter plot card is revealed, kneel Ser Robar Royce.

flavor: The candles within Renly's pavilion made the shimmering silken walls seem to glow, transforming the great tent into a magical castle alive with emerald light.
name: Renly's Pavilion
text: Action: Kneel Renly's Pavilion to choose 2 characters. Until the end of the phase, one of those characters gets -1 STR, and the other gets +1 STR.

name: Qhorin Halfhand
text: Renown. No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which Qhorin Halfhand is participating, choose and kill a non-unique character with lower STR than his controlled by the losing opponent. Card design by 2009 Melee World Champion, Jonathan Benton.

name: Fist of the First Men
text: While your reserve value is higher than an opponent's, each Ranger character you control gets +1 STR and cannot be bypassed by stealth.

name: Salladhor Saan
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Salladhor Saan is participating, put a Warship location or Weapon attachment into play from your hand.

name: The Valyrian
text: Ambush (2). Action: Kneel The Valyrian to give an attacking character +X STR until the end of the challenge. X is the number of gold in the defending player's gold pool.

flavor: Tyrion had never quite gotten over the suspicion that his father had inflicted the boy on him as a joke.
name: Podrick Payne
text: Interrupt: When a character would be killed for [military] claim, pay 2 gold and put Podrick Payne into play from your hand to save it. Then, if that character was Tyrion Lannister, you may pay 2 gold to choose and kill an attacking character.

flavor: Gods save us, they've raised the chain.
name: Tyrion's Chain
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a participating unique [lannister] character, choose a revealed War plot card. Initiate the when revealed ability on that plot card as if you had just revealed it. (Max 1 per phase.)

name: Esgred
text:
Stealth.
If you control Asha Greyjoy, sacrifice Esgred and have your Asha Greyjoy gain 1 power.
Esgred may bypass an additional character using stealth.

flavor: "And you said you'd name her after me." <cite>Asha Greyjoy</cite>
name: Sea Bitch
text: Action: Sacrifice Sea Bitch to choose a non-limited location. Take control of that location until the end of the phase.

flavor: "To go north, you must journey south, to reach the west you must go east. To go forward you must go back and to touch the light you must pass beneath the shadow."
name: Quaithe of the Shadow
text: Ambush (3). Reaction: After Quaithe of the Shadow enters play during a challenge, remove each character with STR 2 or lower from the challenge.

name: House of the Undying
text: Challenges Action: Remove House of the Undying from the game to choose an opponent. Put each character in that player's dead pile into play under your control. At the end of the phase, return each of those cards to its owner's dead pile (cannot be saved).

flavor: "There have always been men who found it easier to speak vows than to keep them"
name: Ser Arys Oakheart
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After Ser Arys Oakheart enters play, pay 2 gold to choose an Ally character, and discard it from play.

flavor: It took its name from the murky green of its sluggish waters; but as they approached, the sunlight seemed to turn those waters gold.
name: The Greenblood
text: Each [martell] character you control gets +1 STR for each Summer plot card revealed.

name: Northern Refugee
text: While there is a Winter plot card revealed, reduce the cost to marshal Northern Refugee by 1.

name: Relentless Assault
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, kneel your faction card. Then, you may initiate an additional challenge of that type this phase.

name: Tarred Heads
text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, discard 1 card at random from the losing opponent's hand. If that card is a character, place it in its owner's dead pile.

name: Battle of the Blackwater
text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. Discard each duplicate you control and each duplicate controlled by that opponent from play.

name: Cersei Lannister
text: Cersei Lannister does not kneel when declared as an attacker in an [intrigue] challenge. Reaction: After 1 or more cards are discarded from an opponent's hand, if you do not support that player, Cersei Lannister gains 1 power. (Limit 3 times per round.)

flavor: "My mind is my weapon."
name: Tyrion Lannister
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, return an attacking Clansman character to your hand to (choose one): draw 2 cards, gain 3 gold, or raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Limit twice per phase.)

name: Ser Kevan Lannister
text: Reaction: After you marshal Ser Kevan Lannister, choose a [lannister] or neutral location or attachment in your discard pile and put it into play. Card design by 2012 Chinese National Champion, Bing Ouyang.

flavor: "The Burned Men fear nothing. Timett Son of Timett will ride with the lions."
name: Timett Son of Timett
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Timett Son of Timett is attacking, choose and kill a character with printed cost X or lower. X is the number of Clansman characters you control.

name: Ser Jaime Lannister
text: Each Knight character you control gains renown while attacking alone. Challenges Action: Choose a Kingsguard character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an [intrigue] icon. (Limit once per phase.)

flavor: "...when your enemies defy you, you must serve them steel and fire."
name: Tywin Lannister
text: Pillage. Interrupt: When exactly 1 card is discarded from a player's deck, instead look at the top 2 cards of that player's deck and discard 1.

name: Chella Daughter of Cheyk
text: Chella Daughter of Cheyk gets +1 STR for each ear token she has. While she has 3 or more ear tokens, she gains intimidate and renown. Reaction: After a character is killed during a challenge in which Chella Daughter of Cheyk is attacking, place an ear token on her.

name: Ser Gregor's Marauders
text: Pillage. Reaction: After Ser Gregor's Marauders discards an event using pillage, stand Ser Gregor's Marauders.

name: Shagga Son of Dolf
text: While Shagga Son of Dolf is in your hand, he gains ambush (0) if you control a Clansman character or Tyrion Lannister. Forced Reaction: After Shagga Son of Dolf enters play using ambush, choose and kill a [lannister] character you control.

flavor: "Dreams turn to dust in light of day."
name: Taena Merryweather
text: Reaction: After you play an event, choose and discard 1 card from your hand to draw 1 card.

name: Moon Brothers
text: Action: During a challenge in which you control an attacking Clansman character, kneel your faction card to put Moon Brothers into play from your hand (standing), participating as an attacker.

name: Red Keep Spy
text: Ambush (4). Reaction: After Red Keep Spy enters play using ambush, choose a character with printed cost 3 or lower. If you have more cards in hand than that character's controller, return it to its owner's hand.

flavor: "My lord will find my tongue well schooled. When I was a girl I learned when to use it, and when not."
name: Alayaya
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Alayaya is participating, move 1 gold from the losing opponent's gold pool to your own.

flavor: At sixteen, he was cursed with all the certainty of youth, unleavened by any trace of humor or self-doubt, and wed to the arrogance that came so naturally to those born blond and strong and handsome.
name: Ser Lancel Lannister
text: While you control exactly 1 other [lannister] Lord or Lady character, Ser Lancel Lannister gets +X STR, where X is that character's STR.

flavor: "When I'm king in my own right, I'm going to outlaw beets."
name: Tommen Baratheon
text: Each player with no cards in his or her hand cannot gain power from challenge bonuses (unopposed and rivals).

name: Lannisport Guard
text: Reaction: After you marshal Lannisport Guard, each player draws 1 card.

name: Golden Tooth
text: Limited. Action: Kneel Golden Tooth to gain 1 gold. (3 gold instead if an opponent has no cards in his or her hand.)

flavor: Shadowcats prowled those passes, rock slides were common, and the mountain clans were lawless brigands...
name: Mountains of the Moon
text: Reaction: After a Clansman character enters play, that character gains a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

name: Lannisport Treasury
text: Reaction: After the taxation phase begins, place 1 gold from your gold pool on Lannisport Treasury. Marshaling Action: Kneel Lannisport Treasury to move any number of gold from Lannisport Treasury to your gold pool.

name: Shield of Lannisport
text: [lannister] Lord or Lady character only. While you control no Lord or Lady characters with printed cost 4 or higher other than attached character, attached character gets +2 STR and gains renown. +1 Income.

flavor: ...a length of dragonbone and Valyrian steel, as sharp as the difference between right and wrong, between true and false, between life and death.
name: Valyrian Steel Dagger
text: During [intrigue] challenges, attached character gets +2 STR and gains stealth.

name: A Lannister Always Pays His Debts
text: Challenges Action: Choose an opponent who has won a challenge against you this phase. You may initiate an additional [military] and [intrigue] challenge against that player this phase. (Max 1 per phase.)

name: Insidious Scheme
text: Reaction: After claim is applied for an [intrigue] challenge you won by 5 or more STR, draw 2 cards. (4 cards instead if the losing opponent has no cards in his or her hand.)

name: Daring Rescue
text: Play only if you control a Knight character. Challenges Action: Return a character you control to its owner's hand. Then, have a Knight character you control gain 1 power.

flavor: "I won't go pray to the Lord of Light. I am a Warrior's man, like my father."
name: Edric Storm
text: Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, choose a character. That character does not contribute its STR to its controller's total for dominance this phase.

name: Disputed Claim
text: Bastard, Lord, or Lady character only. While you have more power on your faction card than each opponent, attached character gets +2 STR and gains renown.

flavor: "Come kill me, if you can."
name: Victarion Greyjoy
text: Intimidate. Renown. Interrupt: When Victarion Greyjoy would be killed, discard 2 power from him to save him.

name: Old Wyk
text: Reaction: After you initiate a [power] challenge, kneel Old Wyk to put the top Drowned God character in your dead pile into play knelt, participating as an attacker. If you win the challenge by 5 or more STR, return that character to your hand. Otherwise, place it on the bottom of your deck.

name: Trystane Martell
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Trystane Martell is participating, choose a character with lower STR than his. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as a defender.

flavor: "Elia. Say it! Elia of Dorne!" <cite>The Red Viper</cite>
name: You Murdered Her Children
text: Challenges Action: Choose a [martell] character you control. Until the end of the phase, double that character's STR. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, kill it.

flavor: The slender blond steward they called Sweet Donnel had laid a shaft just off the bull's eye at fifly yards.
name: Sweet Donnel Hill
text: No attachments except Weapon. While Sweet Donnel Hill is defending, each attacking character loses all keywords.

flavor: At the Bridge of Skulls he had met the Weeper and three hundred wildlings and won a bloody battle.
name: Bridge of Skulls
text: Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, choose an opponent who did not initiate a military challenge against you this phase. That player discards one card at random from his or her hand.

flavor: "I shall be a good and true wife to Robb, I swear. And as wise a queen as I can."
name: Jeyne Westerling
text: Action: Kneel Jeyne Westerling to choose and stand a [stark] King or Lord character.

flavor: "...the Umbers may seem simple, but they are not without a certain low cunning." <cite>Roose Bolton</cite>
name: Last Hearth Scouts
text: Forced Reaction: After a character enters play during the challenges phase, kneel that character.

flavor: "I am a knight... I shall die a knight."
name: Ser Barristan Selmy
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Barristan Selmy is participating, if you have fewer cards in hand than the losing opponent, stand him.

name: Daenerys's Favor
text:
[targaryen] character only.
While attached character is participating in a challenge, each other participating character gets -1 STR.

flavor: Sansa recognized only Lord Tyrell's tall dignified wife, Lady Alerie, whose long silvery braid was bound with jeweled rings.
name: Alerie Tyrell
text: Reaction: After Alerie Tyrell enters play, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a [tyrell] character with printed cost 3 or lower, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: "A Rose of Gold"
text: Challenges Action: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand, and place the others on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: High Septon
text: Interrupt: When an opponent chooses a character you control as the only target of a triggered ability, choose an eligible The Seven character you control to become the target of that triggered ability instead. (Limit once per phase.)

flavor: The Warrior stands before the foe, protecting us where e'er we go. With sword and shield and spear and bow, he guards the little children.
name: Devout Freerider
text: During the challenges phase, each player cannot gain gold.

name: Wildling Bandit
text: While Wildling Bandit is attacking an opponent with more gold in his or her gold pool than you, it gets +2 STR.

name: Ocean Road
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Ocean Road to reduce the cost of the next neutral or out-of-faction card you marshal this phase by 1.

name: Appointed
text: Unique character only. Attached character gains an [intrigue] icon and the Small Council trait.

flavor: "So the king has decreed. The small council consents." <cite>Grand Maester Pycelle</cite>
name: The Council Consents
text: Reaction: After a player wins an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, stand each Small Council character.

name: "The Rains of Castamere"
text: Your plot deck must be 12 cards, including exactly 5 different Scheme cards. During the plot phase, Scheme cards are not considered to be in your plot deck. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to reveal a Scheme plot. If that card leaves play, remove it from the game. Card Design by 2013 Joust World Champion, Álvaro Rodriguez.

name: Lions of the Rock
text: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, gain 3 gold.

name: Unexpected Delay
text: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, each player chooses a character without attachments or power. Return each of those characters to its owner's hand.

name: Summoned to Court
text: Forced Interrupt: When the draw phase ends, each player chooses a card in his or her hand, if able. Then, reveal the chosen cards. Each player who revealed a character with the lowest printed cost may put that character into play.

name: Littlefinger's Meddling
text: Reduce the cost of each event you play by 2.

name: Gossip and Lies
text: Each character you control does not kneel when declared as an attacker in the first [intrigue] challenge you initiate during the challenges phase.

name: Time of Plenty
text: Increase the number of cards each player draws in the draw phase by 1.

name: Early Frost
text: Reduce the number of cards each player draws in the draw phase by 1.

flavor: Her father was growing weaker and more delirious with every passing day, waking only to mutter, "Tansy," and beg forgiveness.
name: Hoster Tully
text: While Hoster Tully is participating in a challenge, each other participating House Tully character you control gains renown.

name: The Tumblestone
text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After a House Tully character gains power, discard 1 gold from The Tumblestone to stand that character.

flavor: Margaery's kindness had been unfailing, and her presence changed everything.
name: Margaery Tyrell
text: Renown. Reaction: After a unique King or Lord character you control is killed, search your deck for a unique King or Lord character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "...but the ones in motley are more amusing than ones with crowns." <cite>The Queen of Thorns</cite>
name: All Men Are Fools
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, each Lady character you control gains 1 power. (Max 1 per challenge.)

flavor: Eastwatch was a better place to trade than Castle Black; that was where the ships came, laden with goods from the fabled lands beyond the sea.
name: Eastwatch Carpenter
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you collect income, gain 1 gold for every 2 [thenightswatch] locations you control.

name: Eastwatch-by-the-Sea
text: Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, if you have a higher reserve value than an opponent, draw 1 card. +1 Reserve.

name: Fickle Bannerman
text: Bestow (2). Renown. Forced Reaction: After you lose a [power] challenge, the winning opponent takes control of Fickle Bannerman unless you discard 1 gold from it.

flavor: "There are spells woven into the stones. Dark walls that no shadow can pass — ancient, forgotten, yet still in place." <cite>Melisandre</cite>
name: Storm's End
text: Reaction: After you win dominance, discard 1 power from your faction card to choose 2 characters. Each of those characters gains 1 power.

name: Stone Crows
text: Ambush (3). Bestow (2). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Stone Crows is attacking, discard 1 gold from it to have the losing opponent choose and kill a defending character.

flavor: "The Blackfish was my Knight of the Gate, and since he left us the mountain clans are growing very bold." <cite>Lysa Arryn</cite>
name: Attack From the Mountains
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Clansman character, put a Clansman character into play from your hand.

flavor: "Comforts I shall know in the Drowned God's watery halls beneath the waves." <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>
name: Drowned Disciple
text: Reaction: After a character enters play from your dead pile, choose a Drowned God character and have it gain 1 power. (Limit twice per phase.)

name: Moat Cailin
text: While there are more Winter plot cards than Summer plot cards revealed, reduce the initiative value on each opponent's revealed plot card by 3, and the reserve value on each opponent's revealed plot card by 1.

flavor: "Ours is the blood of ancient Ghis, whose empire was old when Valyria was yet a squalling child." <cite>Grazdan mo Eraz</cite>
name: Ghiscari Elite
text: Reaction: After Ghiscari Elite is knelt, choose an attachment or event in your discard pile, and place it on the bottom of your deck.

name: Slaver's Bay Port
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Slaver's Bay Port to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if an opponent has 4 or more characters in his or her dead pile.)

name: Ricasso
text: Bestow (2). You are considered to have X additional plot cards in your used pile. X is the number of gold Ricasso has.

name: The Prince's Plan
text: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile and gains a challenge icon of your choice. Reaction: After you lose a challenge, pay 1 gold to return The Prince's Plan from your discard pile to your hand.

flavor: "You know nothing, Jon Snow."
name: Ygritte
text: Ygritte cannot be knelt by card effects. While you control another Wildling character, Ygritte gains stealth.

name: Alliance
text: Your minimum deck size is 75 cards. You may run 2 Banner agendas in addition to this agenda.

name: Barring the Gates
text: Card abilities cannot cause characters to enter play.

name: Late Summer Feast
text: Forced Reaction: After you win a challenge, the losing opponent may draw 1 card.

name: Bear Island Host
text: Bestow (3). No attachments. Action: Discard 1 gold from Bear Island Host to choose a House Mormont character. Until the end of the phase, that character does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge.

name: Marriage Pact
text: Terminal. Attached character cannot participate in challenges against you. Forced Interrupt: When attached character leaves play, sacrifice a character you control.

name: Knight of the Reach
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Knight of the Reach is attacking or defending alone, choose a Lady character. That character gains 1 power.

flavor: From his throne of bones the Lord of Death looked down on the murdered lord...
name: "Lord Renly's Ride"
text: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +X STR and gains intimidate. X is the printed STR of the top character in your dead pile.

flavor: "Don't you call me that. I'm a mother, not a lady."
name: Gilly
text: Bestow (3). Action: Discard 1 gold from Gilly to choose a Steward character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth.

name: Guarding the Realm
text: Marshaling Action: Choose a character with printed cost 3 or lower in an opponent's discard pile, and put it into play under your control. Reaction: After you win a challenge as the defending player, pay 1 gold to return Guarding the Realm from your discard pile to your hand.

flavor: "We choose light or we choose darkness. We choose good or we choose evil. We choose the true god or the false."
name: Melisandre
text: Insight. Reaction: After you win dominance, choose an opponent and look at his or her hand. Then, choose and discard 1 card from that hand. If that card is a character, place it in its owner's dead pile.

flavor: "Lead us from the darkness, O my Lord. Fill our hearts with fire, so we may walk your shining path."
name: Light of the Lord
text: [baratheon] or R'hllor character only. Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, stand attached character and gain 1 gold.

flavor: "Looking for your brother, Sandor?"
name: Polliver
text: Pillage. Reaction: After Polliver discards a character using pillage, return 2 gold from the losing opponent's gold pool to the treasury.

flavor: Even with the windows of the solar shuttered against the night, the chill in the room was palpable.
name: The Hand's Solar
text: Action: Kneel The Hand's Solar to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an [intrigue] icon.

name: Wex Pyke
text: Bestow (8). While Wex Pyke is attacking, each character with printed cost X cannot be declared as a defender. X is the number of gold Wex Pyke has. Dominance Action: Move 1 gold from your gold pool to Wex Pyke. (Limit twice per phase.)

name: Iron Islands Market
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Iron Islands Market to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if an opponent has 8 or more cards in his or her discard pile.)

name: Second Sons
text: Bestow (3). Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, sacrifice Second Sons unless you discard 1 gold from it.

name: A Dragon Is No Slave
text: Challenges Action: Choose a character without attachments. That character gets -2 STR until the end of the phase. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a participating Dragon character or Daenerys Targaryen, pay 1 gold to return A Dragon Is No Slave from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Orphan of the Greenblood
text: Bestow (3). Action: Discard 1 gold from Orphan of the Greenblood to return another character you control to its owner's hand.

name: Scorching Deserts
text: Reaction: After a character with fewer than 2 challenge icons is declared as an attacker or defender, kneel and sacrifice Scorching Deserts to remove that character from the challenge.

flavor: Black Walder was a man who took what he wanted, even his brother's wife.
name: Black Walder
text:
Bestow (3).
During the third challenge you initiate each phase, Black Walder gains renown and gets +2 STR for each gold he has.

name: Great Hall
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Great Hall to reduce the cost of the next unique character you marshal this phase by 1. (By 2 instead if that character's printed cost is 6 or higher.)

name: "The Dornishman's Wife"
text: Action: Choose an opponent. If that player has a higher power total than you, gain 2 gold. If that player has more cards in his or her hand than you, gain 1 power for your faction. If that player controls more characters than you, draw 1 card.

name: The Annals of Castle Black
text: Each player may play events in his or her discard pile as if they were in his or her hand. Forced Reaction: After an event is placed in a discard pile, remove it from the game. Card design by 2014 Overall World Champion, Alexander Hynes.

flavor: She was strong and swift and fierce, and her pack was all around her, her brothers and her sisters.
name: Roaming Wolfpack
text: Intimidate. No attachments. While Roaming Wolfpack is attacking, each attacking Direwolf character gets +2 STR.

name: The North Remembers
text: Challenges Action: Each player sacrifices a character or location. Reaction: After a character you control is killed, pay 1 gold to return The North Remembers from your discard pile to your hand.

flavor: Megga was round and loud, Alla shy and pretty, but Elinor ruled the three by right of womanhood...
name: Elinor Tyrell
text: You may marshal or play 1 additional limited card each round.

name: Silver Hair Net
text: Lady character only. Attached character gains stealth. While attached character is participating in a challenge, reduce the cost of each event you play by 1.

name: Recruiter for the Watch
text: You may choose not to stand Recruiter for the Watch during the standing phase. Marshaling Action: Kneel Recruiter for the Watch to choose a character with printed cost 2 or lower. Take control of that character until Recruiter for the Watch stands or leaves play.

name: Underground Vault
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Underground Vault to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if the gold value on an opponent's revealed plot card is 5 or higher.)

flavor: The Bottom had a stench to it, a stink of pigsties and stables and tanner's sheds, mixed in with the sour smell of winesinks and cheap whorehouses.
name: Flea Bottom Bastard
text: During the dominance phase, Flea Bottom Bastard gets +3 STR.

flavor: ...for every one that broke the surface, a dozen lurked treacherously just below it. Any captain with sense kept his course well away from them.
name: Spears of the Merling King
text: Interrupt: When a character you control is killed, sacrifice Spears of the Merling King to return that character to your hand instead of placing it in your dead pile.

name: Cersei's Attendant
text: While Cersei's Attendant is participating in a challenge against an opponent with no cards in his or her hand, Cersei's Attendant gains insight.

name: Fever Dreams
text: Opponent's character only. Bestow (3). Reaction: After attached character is knelt, discard 1 gold from Fever Dreams to draw 2 cards.

flavor: "A dead enemy is a thing of beauty."
name: Theon Greyjoy
text: While Theon Greyjoy is attacking alone, each character with a higher STR than his does not contribute its STR to the challenge.

name: Corsair's Dirk
text: Ironborn character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is attacking, move 1 gold from the losing opponent's gold pool to your own.

name: Grey Worm
text: No attachments except Weapon. Action: During a challenge in which Grey Worm is attacking, choose a defending character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets -3 STR. (Limit once per challenge.)

name: Astapor
text: Bestow (4). Action: Kneel Astapor to choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets -X STR. X is the number of gold Astapor has.

name: Maester of Sunspear
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Maester of Sunspear is participating, choose an attachment and return it to its owner's hand.

name: Dornish Fiefdom
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Dornish Fiefdom to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if you are not the first player.)

name: Frey Lordling
text: Reaction: After you initiate a challenge, Frey Lordling gets +1 STR until the end of the phase.

name: The Twins
text: During the third challenge you initiate each phase, if you control an attacking House Frey character, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

name: Lay Siege
text: Action: Choose and kneel a location. Then, if that location is Contested, discard it from play.

name: Duel
text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. That player chooses 2 non-Army characters, each with printed cost 6 or higher. Then, that player chooses and kneels 1 of those characters. Kill the other (cannot be saved). Card design by 2014 North American Champion, Jonathan Andrews.

flavor: "I have fought beside the Young Wolf in every battle... He has not lost one yet."
name: Dacey Mormont
text:
Renown.
X is the number of [stark] characters you control.

name: Winterfell Archery Range
text: Action: During a [military] challenge, kneel Winterfell Archery Range to choose a participating character with STR 3 or lower, and remove it from the challenge. Card Design by 2015 Melee North American Champion, Brian Aurelio.

name: Oldtown Informer
text: Ambush (2). Bestow (3). Reaction: After a card enters play during the challenges phase, draw X cards. Then, discard X cards. X is the number of gold Oldtown Informer has.

name: Arbor Vineyard
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Arbor Vineyard to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if there are more Summer plot cards than Winter plot cards revealed.)

flavor: "Pick who you want, just so it's not me."
name: Othell Yarwyck
text: Action: Kneel a [thenightswatch] location to choose a [thenightswatch] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a challenge icon of your choice.

flavor: So Castle Black had a wall of sorts at last...
name: Improved Fortifications
text: Location only. Interrupt: When attached location would leave play, sacrifice Improved Fortifications to save it.

name: Ser Axell Florent
text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Axell Florent is participating, discard 1 gold from him to choose and kneel a character without attachments.

name: Saving the Kingdom
text: Challenges Action: Choose and kneel a character with STR 3 or lower. That character cannot stand during the standing phase this round. Reaction: After you win dominance, pay 1 gold to return Saving the Kingdom from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Ser Osmund Kettleblack
text: Bestow (3). Challenges Action: Discard 1 gold from Ser Osmund Kettleblack to put a Knight character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play (cannot be saved). (Limit once per phase.)

name: Tywin's Stratagem
text: Challenges Action: Choose a character with printed cost 2 or lower controlled by each player. Return each of those characters to its owner's hand. Reaction: After a character is discarded from an opponent's hand or deck, pay 1 gold to return Tywin's Stratagem from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Silence's Crew
text: Bestow (3). No attachments. Pillage. Silence's Crew gets +2 STR for each gold it has. Reaction: After Silence's Crew discards a location or attachment using pillage, place 1 gold from the treasury on Silence's Crew.

name: Plunder
text: Action: Kneel your faction card to choose an opponent. Gain 1 gold for each location and attachment in that player's discard pile.

flavor: "Killing makes Strong Belwas hungry."
name: Strong Belwas
text: Bestow (2). Interrupt: When another unique [targaryen] character would be killed, discard 1 gold from Strong Belwas to save it. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Breaker of Chains
text: Unique [targaryen] character only. Attached character gets +1 STR for each character you control with printed cost 2 or lower. Reaction: After attached character is declared as an attacker, put a character with printed cost 2 or lower into play from your hand.

name: Ellaria Sand
text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Ellaria Sand is participating, discard 1 gold from her to stand each Bastard character you control.

name: Secret Schemes
text: Action: Kneel your faction card to draw X cards. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile.

flavor: "My honored guests. Be welcome beneath my roof, and at my table."
name: Walder Frey
text: Renown. While Walder Frey is attacking, each other House Frey character you control is also considered to be attacking.

name: Frey Bastard
text: Bestow (2). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control 2 or more attacking House Frey characters, discard 1 gold from Frey Bastard to gain 1 power for your faction.

name: Frey Hospitality
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking House Frey character, if it was the third challenge you initiated this phase, choose and kill a character controlled by the losing opponent. (Choose and kill 3 characters instead if you won by 20 or more STR.)

name: The Red Wedding
text: Interrupt: When you win a challenge as the attacking player, choose and kill a Lord or Lady character controlled by the losing opponent. (Any player may initiate this ability.)

flavor: Bran closed his eyes and gave himself up to the wolf dream, to the smells and sounds of midnight.
name: Bran Stark
text: Action: Kneel Bran Stark to choose and stand a Direwolf character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a challenge icon of your choice.

flavor: The Black Gate, Sam had called it, but it wasn't black at all.
name: Passing the Black Gate
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel your faction card to reduce the cost of each [stark] character you marshal this phase by 1.

name: Ser Garlan Tyrell
text: Bestow (3). Renown. Ser Garlan Tyrell gets +1 STR for each gold he has. Action: Discard 1 gold from Ser Garlan Tyrell to choose a [tyrell] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR.

name: Olenna's Machinations
text: Challenges Action: You may initiate an additional [power] challenge this phase. (Max 1 per phase.) Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, pay 1 gold to return Olenna's Machinations from your discard pile to your hand.

flavor: The wildlings might have a hundred and twenty men, but four defenders would be enough to see them off, with a few well-placed arrows and perhaps a pail of stones.
name: Defender of the Wall
text: No attachments except Weapon. While Defender of the Wall is defending, it gets +2 STR.

name: Mutiny At Craster's Keep
text: Dominance Action: Choose a character with the highest printed cost among characters you control. Sacrifice that character to choose a character an opponent controls and discard it from play.

name: Stannis's Cavalry
text: Bestow (8). No attachments. Each character an opponent controls with printed cost X cannot stand during the standing phase. X is the number of gold Stannis's Cavalry has. Standing Action: Move 1 gold from your gold pool to Stannis's Cavalry. (Limit twice per phase.)

name: Northern Encampment
text: Limited. Northern Encampment cannot stand during the standing phase unless you have won dominance this round. Marshaling Action: Kneel Northern Encampment to gain 2 gold.

name: Kayce Merchant
text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After you collect income, discard 1 gold from Kayce Merchant to gain 2 gold.

name: A Task For Every Tool
text: Challenges Action: Put a [lannister] character with printed STR 2 or lower into play from your hand.

flavor: "The strong have always taken from the weak."
name: Nute the Barber
text: Pillage. Reaction: After a character you control discards a card using pillage, return a card from the losing opponent's discard pile to its owner's hand. Then, draw 1 card. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

name: Iron Victory
text: While you control Victarion Greyjoy, he gets +1 STR for each power he has. Reaction: After a [greyjoy] character is saved, that character gains 1 power. (Limit twice per phase.)

flavor: "It is great honor to please my khaleesi."
name: Irri
text: Bestow (2). Action: Discard 1 gold from Irri to choose and stand a Lord or Lady character. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Overthrowing the Masters
text: Action: During a challenge in which you are the attacking player, choose a defending character with X STR or lower and remove it from the challenge. X is the number of characters in the defending player's dead pile.

name: The Red Viper
text:
Renown.
While The Red Viper is attacking, each defending character with fewer than 2 challenge icons does not contribute its STR to the challenge.

name: Dornish Revenge
text: Reaction: After you initiate a challenge, choose a character controlled by the defending player. That character must be declared as a defender for this challenge, if able. If you win this challenge by 5 or more STR, the losing opponent must choose and kill a defending character.

name: Begging Brother
text: Bestow (3). Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered character ability would initiate, discard 1 gold from Begging Brother to cancel those effects.

name: Flea Bottom
text: Challenges Action: Pay 1 gold and kneel Flea Bottom to put a character with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your discard pile. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, place it on the bottom of your deck. Card design by 2004 World Champion, Greg Atkinson.

name: The Iron Bank Will Have Its Due
text: Action: If it is not the taxation phase, kneel your faction card and return a character to your hand to gain gold equal to that character's printed cost. Until the end of the round, you cannot marshal or put into play any card with the same title as that character. Card design by 2013 Melee World Champion, Ryan Jones.

name: Wheels Within Wheels
text: When Revealed: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for any number of events and reveal them. Add 1 to your hand, and place the others in your discard pile. Shuffle your deck.

name: Sansa's Maid
text: Bestow (3). Each Lady character you control gets +1 STR for each gold Sansa's Maid has.

name: Northern Keep
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Northern Keep to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if there are more Winter plot cards than Summer plot cards revealed.)

flavor: "My lord father always keeps singers at court, sweeter ones than Butters here, and pipers and fiddlers and harpers as well." <cite>Margaery Tyrell</cite>
name: Highgarden Minstrel
text: Reaction: After you play a Song event, gain 1 gold. (Limit 3 times per round.)

name: Horn Hill
text: Bestow (3). Challenges Action: Kneel Horn Hill to give each participating [tyrell] character you control +X STR until the end of the challenge. X is the number of gold Horn Hill has.

flavor: "The Watch is not what it was. Too few honest men to keep the rogues in line."
name: Donal Noye
text: Bestow (3). No attachments except Weapon. Action: Discard 1 gold from Donal Noye to put a Weapon attachment into play from your hand.

name: Ranger's Bow
text: [thenightswatch] character only. Attached character gets +1 STR. Challenges Action: Kneel Ranger's Bow to choose a defending [thenightswatch] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR.

flavor: "Under the sea, the fish eat us. I know, I know, oh, oh, oh."
name: Patchface
text: While another Fool character has a keyword, Patchface gains that keyword. While another Fool character has a challenge icon, Patchface gains that challenge icon.

name: King's Blood
text: Bastard or King character you control only. Bestow (3). Plot Action: Kneel attached character and sacrifice King's Blood to discard X power from each opponent's faction card. X is the number of gold King's Blood has.

name: Genna Frey
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Genna Frey is attacking, if it was the third challenge you initiated this phase, the losing opponent discards 1 card at random from his or her hand. (2 cards instead if you control another attacking House Frey character.)

name: The Goldroad
text: Limited. Challenges Action: Kneel The Goldroad to gain 1 gold. +1 Income.

name: Stony Shore Raider
text: Bestow (3). Action: Discard 1 gold from Stony Shore Raider to choose and kneel a location with printed cost 3 or lower. (Limit once per round.)

name: Pay The Iron Price
text: Challenges Action: Choose an attachment in an opponent's discard pile, and put it into play under your control. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, pay 1 gold to return Pay The Iron Price from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Freedmen
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, put Freedmen into play from your discard pile.

name: Warrior's Braid
text: [targaryen] character only. Attached character gains renown, and gets +1 STR for each bell token on Warrior's Braid. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which attached character is attacking, place a bell token on Warrior's Braid.

name: Dornish Spy
text: Ambush (4). Reaction: After Dornish Spy enters play, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice.

flavor: Hers was a gentle prison.
name: Locked Away
text: Terminal. Reaction: After the marshaling phase begins, return attached character to its owner's hand (cannot be saved).

name: Beric Dondarrion
text: Renown. X is the number of kiss tokens Beric Dondarrion has. Forced Reaction: After you marshal Beric Dondarrion, place 6 kiss tokens on him. (Cannot be canceled.) Interrupt: When Beric Dondarrion would be killed, discard a kiss token from him to save him. Card design by 2014 European Melee Champion, Jakob Hultman.

name: Unbridled Generosity
text: Action: Choose up to 3 cards. Move 1 gold from the treasury to each of those cards.

name: The Brotherhood Without Banners
text: You cannot include loyal characters in your deck. Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, kneel your faction card to choose a neutral character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gains (choose one): insight, intimidate, renown, or stealth.

name: Favors From the Crown
text: Reaction: After a card with bestow enters play, place 1 gold from the treasury on that card. (2 gold instead if that card has 3 or more gold on it.)

flavor: "There's no shame in fear, my father told me, what matters is how we face it."
name: Jon Snow
text: Stealth. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Jon Snow is participating, either: stand each attacking Wildling character, or stand each defending [thenightswatch] character. (Limit once per phase.)

flavor: "Bowen Marsh? The man counts spoons." <cite>Cotton Pyke</cite>
name: Bowen Marsh
text: During [intrigue] challenges, each Steward character you control gains insight. +1 Reserve.

flavor: "When dead men come hunting in the night, do you think it matters who sits on the Iron Throne?"
name: Old Bear Mormont
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Old Bear Mormont is participating, choose a non-unique character in the losing opponent's discard pile, and put it into play under your control.

name: Cotter Pyke
text: Stealth. Reaction: After Cotter Pyke bypasses a character using stealth, if there is a Winter plot card revealed, choose a [thenightswatch] character and have it gain stealth until the end of the phase.

name: Maester Aemon
text: No attachments except Item. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, choose an opponent and a challenge type that has not been initiated against you this phase. That player must satisfy the claim of that challenge type as if you were the winning opponent.

name: Grizzled Miner
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reduce the cost to marshal Grizzled Miner by 1 for each [thenightswatch] attachment and location you control (to a minimum of 1).

flavor: "So long as the Night's Watch remains in good hands, I am content."
name: Ser Denys Mallister
text: While Ser Denys Mallister is defending, he gains renown.

flavor: "No horn was blown, my lord, or my rangers would have heard it. I do not have sufficient men to mount as many patrols as I should like..."
name: Ser Jaremy Rykker
text: No attachments except Weapon. Each other Ranger character you control gains a [power] icon.

name: Castle Black Mason
text: No attachments except Weapon. Action: Kneel 2 Builder characters to search the top 10 cards of your deck for a location or attachment, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. (Limit twice per round.)

name: Grenn
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Grenn is attacking, move 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card to another attacking [thenightswatch] character. (Up to 2 power instead if that character is standing.)

name: Pyp
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Pyp is attacking, choose another attacking [thenightswatch] character. That character gains insight until the end of the phase.

flavor: "The worst isn't done. The worst is just beginning, and there are no happy endings."
name: Samwell Tarly
text: While Samwell Tarly is participating in a challenge, treat each other participating non-Steward character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

flavor: "The other recruits started out despising him, but he won them over and made friends of them all." <cite>Jon Snow</cite>
name: Satin
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After Satin is knelt, choose and stand another Steward character. (Limit twice per phase.)

name: Lost Ranger
text: No attachments except Weapon. Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you control no other Ranger characters, sacrifice Lost Ranger.

name: Seasoned Woodsman
text: Reaction: After you attach an attachment to Seasoned Woodsman, either: gain 1 gold, or draw 1 card. (Limit twice per phase.)

flavor: The order of builders provided the masons and carpenters to repair keeps and towers, the miners to dig tunnels and crush stone for roads and footpaths, the woodsmen to clear away new growth wherever the forest pressed too close to the Wall.
name: Builder at the Wall
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Builder at the Wall to reduce the cost of the next [thenightswatch] attachment or location you marshal this phase by 1.

name: The New Gift
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel a Steward character to gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per phase.) Challenges Action: Kneel a Steward character to draw 1 card. (Limit twice per phase.)

name: Abandoned Stronghold
text: Action: Kneel Abandoned Stronghold to choose a defending character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +X STR. X is the number of Builder characters you control.

name: Queenscrown
text: Action: Kneel Queenscrown to reveal the top 3 cards of an opponent's deck. Choose up to 1 character revealed this way and place it in that player's discard pile. Place the other cards on the bottom of that player's deck in any order.

name: Catapult on the Wall
text: Action: Kneel Catapult on the Wall and attached character to choose and kill an attacking character with STR 4 or lower. Attached character cannot stand during the standing phase this round.

name: Ghost
text: [thenightswatch] or [stark] character only. Interrupt: When attached character would be killed, return Ghost to your hand to save that character.

name: Sworn to the Watch
text: Attached character gains the [thenightswatch] affiliation. While attached character has: - a [military] icon, it gains the Ranger trait. - an [intrigue] icon, it gains the Steward trait. - a [power] icon, it gains the Builder trait.

name: Now My Watch Begins
text: Reaction: After a character with printed cost 5 or lower is placed in an opponent's discard pile, put that character into play under your control.

name: I Shall Win No Glory
text: Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you, kneel 3 Builder characters, 3 Ranger characters, or 3 Steward characters to end the challenge immediately with no winner or loser.

flavor: ...it was his own Marya he pictured, a good-natured plump woman with sagging breasts and a kindly smile, the best woman in the world.
name: Marya Seaworth
text: Reaction: After a character is bypassed using stealth, pay 1 gold to kneel it. (Limit twice per phase.)

name: Black Betha
text: While you control Ser Davos Seaworth, he gains renown. Action: Kneel Black Betha to choose an attacking character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +X STR. X is the number of kneeling characters the defending player controls.

flavor: "Those who please their captains may be taken as salt wives, an honorable station." <cite>Victarion Greyjoy</cite>
name: Salt Wife
text: Challenges Action: Sacrifice Salt Wife to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as a defender.

name: Raiding the Bay of Ice
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, kneel a Warship location to choose a non-limited location controlled by the losing opponent, and place it on top of its owner's deck.

name: Ulf Son of Umar
text: Reaction: After a Clansman character enters play under your control, Ulf Son of Umar gets +X STR until the end of the phase. X is that character's printed STR. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

flavor: "There's only me." <cite>Ser Jaime Lannister</cite>
name: There Are No Men Like Me
text: Action: Choose a Knight character. Until the end of the phase, that character does not kneel when declared as an attacker or defender in a [military] challenge.

name: Southron Messenger
text: Ambush (5). Reaction: After Southron Messenger enters play during a challenge, choose a participating character with fewer than 2 challenge icons, and return that character to its owner's hand.

name: Lingering Venom
text: Terminal. Reaction: After you lose a challenge, place a venom token on Lingering Venom. Then, if attached character's STR is equal to or lower than the number of venom tokens on Lingering Venom, kill it.

flavor: A dozen times Jeyne and Sansa cried out in unison as riders crashed together, lances exploding into splinters while the commons screamed for their favorites.
name: Jeyne Poole
text: Marshaling Action: Sacrifice Jeyne Poole to return a Lady character from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Summer
text: Unique [stark] character only. Action: Kneel attached character to have it participate in a [military] challenge on your side. (Limit once per challenge.) Action: Pay 1 gold to attach Summer to a different character. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Dothraki Honor Guard
text:
No attachments.
Dothraki Honor Guard gets -1 STR for each card in your hand.

name: Plaza of Pride
text: Action: Kneel Plaza of Pride and discard a card from your hand to choose and stand a character with printed cost X or lower. X is 3 higher than the printed cost of the discarded card.

flavor: "I would gladly take this challenge myself, though I'm not half the swordsman Lord Caron is, or Ser Guyard."
name: Ser Jon Fossoway
text: While Ser Jon Fossoway's STR is 5 or higher, he gains renown.

name: The Honeywine
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, The Honeywine gains 1 power.

flavor: "I'll boil the flesh off you and make a byrnie from your ribs. I'll carve your teeth to cast me runes, and eat me oaten porridge from your skull."
name: Rattleshirt
text: While Rattleshirt is attacking alone, each character without attachments cannot be declared as a defender.

flavor: "We free folk know things you kneelers have forgotten."
name: Dalla
text: Reaction: After a Wildling character enters play under your control, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Crow Killers
text: Crow Killers does not kneel when declared as an attacker against an opponent whose reserve value is higher than yours.

name: The Frozen Shore
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, kneel The Frozen Shore to choose and stand 1 attacking Wildling character for each Winter plot card revealed.

name: Weirwood Bow
text: [thenightswatch] or Wildling character only. Action: Kneel Weirwood Bow to choose a defending character. That character gets -2 STR until the end of the challenge.

name: Scaling the Wall
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Wildling character, choose a non-limited location controlled by the losing opponent. Return that location to its owner's hand.

name: "The Last of the Giants"
text: Action: Put a neutral character into play from your hand. Until the end of the phase, that character gains intimidate. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, kill it (cannot be saved).

name: The Fire That Burns
text: Each [thenightswatch] character you control does not kneel when declared as a defender.

name: Retaliation
text: If you win initiative, you must choose an opponent to be the first player.

name: Whisper Campaign
text: Forced Reaction: After a character without an [intrigue] icon enters play, kneel it.

name: Called Into Service
text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a character, put it into play. If it is a non-character card, draw it and gain 2 gold.

name: The White Shadows
text: Reaction: After a character an opponent controls is killed, put it into play under your control. While that character is in play, treat its printed text box as if it were blank. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, place it in its owner's dead pile (cannot be saved).

name: Name Day Tourney
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which a Knight character you control is attacking or defending alone, choose a Lord or Lady character you control and have it gain 1 power.

name: Frozen Expanse
text: Each character with STR 2 or lower cannot stand.

flavor: Septa Nysterica had a homely pox-scarred face but seemed jolly.
name: Septa Nysterica
text: Action: Kneel Septa Nysterica to choose an attacking character with STR 4 or lower. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge.

name: Oathkeeper
text: Attached character gets +2 STR. Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR in which attached character is participating, sacrifice Oathkeeper to search your deck for a non-[tyrell] character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: "One realm, one god, one king!"
name: Queen's Men
text: Reaction: After you marshal Queen's Men, choose an opponent and look at his or her hand. Then, you may kneel a non-[baratheon] character to choose and discard 1 non-character card from that hand.

name: Maester at the Rock
text: Reaction: After you play a [lannister] event, kneel Maester of the Rock to move that event from your discard pile to the top of your deck.

name: Ashemark
text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel and sacrifice Ashemark to return each character with printed cost X or lower to its owner's hand. X is the number of gold on Ashemark.

name: Valar Dohaeris
text: When Revealed: Each player chooses any number of characters he or she controls with a total printed cost of 10 or lower. Place each character not chosen on the bottom of its owner's deck (cannot be saved).

name: Brightwater Knight
text: Bestow (3). Marshaling Action: Discard 1 gold from Brightwater Knight to reduce the cost of the next (?) character you marshal this phase by 2. (Limit once per phase.)

flavor: ...Oldtown was a veritable labyrinth of a city, all wynds and crisscrossing alleys and narrow crookback streets
name: Oldtown
text: Action: Kneel Oldtown to name a cardtype (character, location, attachment, or event). Then, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card has that cardtype, draw it and gain 1 power for your faction.

flavor: Fair-haired and hazel-eyed, the handsome young singer out of Eastwatch looked more like some dark prince than a black brother.
name: Dareon
text: Reaction: After you play a Song event, choose an opponent. Move 1 gold from that player's gold pool to your own. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Tris Botley
text: Pillage. Action: Choose a card in an opponent's discard pile and remove it from the game. Until Tris Botley leaves play, that player cannot marshal or play any copy of that card. (Limit once per round.)

name: The House With the Red Door
